pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Electric Tale of Pikachu volume 4" - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {25276=Just like the first three volumes, Electric Pikachu Boogaloo was released by VIZ Media as four monthly issues containing one to two chapters each, comprising the entire volume collectively, which was released separately. These monthly comic book issues were released around 2000. As a bonus, these monthly releases each contained fan letters and fan artwork which were not included in the regular volume releases.}
textBeforeTable: Publications 6 Monthly releases 5 Gym battles 4.2 Trades 4.1 Additions 4 Party changes 3 Major events 2 Chapters 1 Publications Contents Volume 4: Surf's Up, Pikachu is the fourth and final volume of the manga series The Electric Tale of Pikachu created by 小野 敏洋 Toshihiro Ono. The Electric Tale of Pikachu Manga series ET15 - ET20 Chapters included Info 250px The Electric Tale of Pikachu volume 4
textAfterTable: Chapters Chapter 1: Attack of the Demon Stomach Chapter 2: You Bet Your Wife Chapter 3: Orange Crew Supreme Gym Leader Chapter 4: Pikachu's Plan Chapter 5: Side Story: Ash vs. Gary Chapter 6: Epilogue: Wild Type Major events Spoiler warning: this article may contain major plot or ending details. Misty rejoins Ash in the Orange Archipelago. Ash earns the Orange League championship trophy. Ash and Gary meet up at a Pokémon research convention. Ash and Gary begin traveling together. Jessie and James are revealed to be a married couple. Party changes Additions
